meanings.definition: One of two children born at the same time to the same mother.
meanings.sent2: The twins played together in the park.
meanings.sent3: The twins wore matching dresses to the party.
meanings.sent4: Their bond was as strong as that of twins.
meanings.sent5: The twin brothers shared a special connection.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is similar or identical to another.
meanings.sent1: The two cars were twins in design.
meanings.sent2: The twin towers stood tall in the city.
meanings.sent3: The twin ideas complemented each other perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Their personalities were like twins, always in sync.
meanings.sent5: The twin peaks of the mountains were a majestic sight.

meanings.definition: To be paired or associated with something else.
meanings.sent1: The red shirt will twin well with those blue pants.
meanings.sent2: Her enthusiasm twinned with his to create a lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The flavors of chocolate and mint twinned to create a delicious dessert.
meanings.sent4: Their voices twinned beautifully in the duet.
meanings.sent5: The music twinned with the sound of rain outside.
